acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Amherst County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Amherst County was formed in 1761 from Albemarle county.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will books, 1761-1786, of Amherst County Court. The will books includes the name of testator, list of heirs and year the wills were proven in court and probate records such as inventories and appraisements.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Amherst County Will Book Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. See A Guide to County and City Records on microfilm at www.lva.lib.va.us/whatwehave/local/local_rec/index.htm
